title: Data mining and spatio-temporal characteristics of urban road ...
summary: This blog post focuses on data mining and the spatio-temporal characteristics of urban road emissions. It mentions using Didi data and survey data to calculate and understand the distribution of NOx and CO2 emissions over space and time.
usefulness_reason: Score 60 assigned because the post explicitly discusses "spatio-temporal characteristics" and mentions the use of "survey data" in the context of urban road emissions. While not directly about point processes, the spatio-temporal and survey data aspects are relevant.
